title: Sadiq Sanjrani’s younger brother died in road accident
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 8 (APP): Chairman Senate Muhammad Sadiq Sanjrani’s younger brother Salar Sanjrani died on Saturday in a car accident at Uthal, Balochistan.
According to reports, Salar Sanjrani’s driver Younis also died in the accident. He was on his way to Quetta from Karachi. The car was collided with an oil tanker near Lasbela.
In a tweet, Deputy Chairman Senate Mirza Muhammad Afridi said that Salar Khan Sanjrani, younger brother of Senate Chairman was martyred in a road accident near Uthal.
